about_the_game:
On your marks, get set, GO!
Compete in the Summer of Sports to become the most decorated athlete in the arcade. Break and set new records in this button mashing and joystick waggling classic.

Take part in numerous summer events, including:
• Sprints
• Hurdles
• Long Jump
• Javelin
• A combination of all the above in a winner takes all challenge!

Compete against your friends in local multiplayer of up to four players, or play solo and challenge yourself to bring home the gold!
